mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as "numsex", year(operation_time) as "year",sex as "sex" FROM hospital_business join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation="异地就医申请" group by sex,year order by year,sex

select count(person.social_security_card)*4 as "num", count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "numgu", person.area as "area",year(operation_time) as "year" from hospital_business join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation='异地就医申请' and person.area="${area}" group by year,area order by year

select count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "num", case when (year(operation_time)-year(birthday))<6 then "童年" when (year(operation_time)-year(birthday))<40 then "青少年" when (year(operation_time)-year(birthday))<65 then "中年" else "老年" end as "age", year(operation_time) as "year" from hospital_business join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation='异地就医申请' group by age,year order by year,age

select count(*) as "num",hospital as "hospital",year(operation_time) as "year" from hospital_business where operation="异地就医申请" and CAST (year(operation_time) as VARCHAR)="${year}" group by hospital,year order by year,num limit 10

select count(*) as "num",hospital as "hospital",department as "department" from hospital_business where operation="异地就医申请" and CAST (year(operation_time) as VARCHAR)="${year}" group by hospital,department order by num limit 10

select count(*) as "num",hospital as "hospital",department as "department",doctor as "doctor" from hospital_business where operation="异地就医申请" and CAST (year(operation_time) as VARCHAR)="${year}" group by hospital,department,doctor order by num limit 10
